code: export var GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS='GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS';export var GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_SUCCESS='GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_SUCCESS';export var GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_FAIL='GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_FAIL';export var GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_RESET='GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_RESET';export var getCategoryDetails=function getCategoryDetails(params){return{type:GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS,params:params};};export var getCategoryDetailsSuccess=function getCategoryDetailsSuccess(response){return{type:GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var getCategoryDetailsFail=function getCategoryDetailsFail(response){return{type:GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_FAIL,response:response};};export var getCategoryDetailsReset=function getCategoryDetailsReset(){return{type:GET_CATEGORY_DETAILS_RESET};};
